title: Gesture2Text: An image processing approach using LSTM and CNN
description: Me and my teammates developed LSTM and CNN models to convert American Sign Language gestures to text, comparing their performance to highlight LSTMs' strength with small datasets and CNNs' with larger ones. This work is part of our book chapter on image processing.
